snippet: Apple Inc and Samsung Electronics have agreed to attend a mediation session to be held on or before February 19, as they prepare to clash in court in March over smartphone patents....

headline.print_headline: Apple, Samsung CEOs Agree to Mediation in U.S. Patent Fight
headline.main: Apple, Samsung CEOs Agree to Mediation in U.S. Patent Fight

lead_paragraph: Apple Inc and Samsung Electronics have agreed to attend a mediation session to be held on or before February 19, as they prepare to clash in court in March over smartphone patents.
